description.value:
You can make an upcoming attack or effect sound so terrifying and dangerous that its targets are actually more likely to be affected by it.
Prerequisites: Cha 19, Bluff 10 ranks.

Benefit: As a full action, you can describe in great detail how powerful and effective a specific action taken by you or an ally is going to be. You must select a specific character to boast about, and a specific weapon, item, spell, or ability to be used. Attempt a Bluff check against all foes within 60 feet of you, using the same DC you would use if attempting to demoralize them with Intimidate—roll a single check and compare the result to the DC for each target. Each target your check succeeds against takes a –1 penalty to AC and a –2 penalty to saving throws against the action you boasted about until the end of your next turn. Once you have attempted to use this ability against a creature, it is immune to your use of this feat for 24 hours. This is a @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.PqV3OCbUTyk2upPD]{Sense-dependent}, @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.PqV3OCbUTyk2upPD]{Language-dependent} ability.

duration.value: Until the end of your next turn.
